ENTERPRISE
Performance and productivity for every level of your enterprise
Scale your processes, ensure company-wide compliance, and maximize tech stack adoption—all with the power of Slack.
TALK TO SALES
WATCH DEMO

PRODUCTIVITY AT SCALE

Meet the needs of your organization with powerful productivity tools

  • Automate everyday tasks and get more time back for what’s most important

  • Get a glimpse of your entire org with ease using Slack Atlas, our built-in team directory tool

  • Visualize team productivity and measure tech stack adoption with advanced analytics

Lear more about Slack at scale

“Slack has been the hammer that has helped us tear down the walls of silos. It has enabled us to position Slack as the operating system of collaboration across 194 countries and 171 offices, pulling us together like nothing else has.”

Jeff Dow, Executive Vice President, Media and Broadcast Operations

SECURITY
Ensure company-wide safety and compliance
  • Consider compliance needs met, including requirements like FINRA, HIPAA and FedRAMP
  • Protect sensitive information and resources with native data loss prevention
  • Take control of data using your own encryption keys with Slack Enterprise Key Management
Learn more about security

“With the introduction of Slack Enterprise Key Management as an added security feature, we immediately saw its value in giving us total control of our data and the assurance that we’re protected in the event of a security threat in our supply chain.”

Colin Black, Chief Operating Officer
PLATFORM

Customize Slack to work the way you do

  • Choose from over 2,600 apps to help bring all your tools together
  • Build time-saving automations and integrate your favorite apps
  • Integrate internal tools, processes, and data with ease
Learn more about apps and integrations

Frequently asked questions

What is Slack Enterprise Grid?

When companies need to drive growth and get more efficient, there's Slack Enterprise Grid. It's designed so companies like yours can coordinate, automate and measure large-scale, cross-functional work, all while meeting strict compliance and security requirements.

If it involves complex data and people management, it's probably a job for Slack Enterprise Grid. Using data, AI and CRM, it boosts productivity and helps organizations overcome their unique challenges. Contact our sales team to get started.

Is there a difference between Slack and Slack Enterprise Grid?

There is! Slack is an AI-powered productivity platform built for organizations of every size. It makes collaboration easier by giving teams access to shared knowledge, new ways of working, and tools for adding clarity to complex organizational structures. It also lets teams create automations that take care of everyday tasks, giving them more time back to focus on what's most important.

Slack Enterprise Grid is all of this and then some, made just for enterprise-level organizations. Compare our pricing plans to see which works best for your business.

How do I migrate to Enterprise Slack?

Our team is happy to help you migrate to the right instance of Slack. Before transitioning to an enterprise workspace, you’ll need to be signed up for an Enterprise Grid plan by contacting our sales team. When you’re ready to get started, reach out to your Account Executive to plan your migration.

Curious how it all works? Admins can explore what to expect before, during, and after the migration.

How secure is Slack?

Very. You can securely share confidential information in Slack. Our platform offers multiple ways to ensure information, conversations and files stay safe, delivering enterprise-grade security at every layer and adhering to multiple compliance certifications, including SOC 2, SOC 3, ISO/IEC 27001 and more. Slack is GDPR-compliant and can be configured for HIPAA and FINRA compliance. It is FedRAMP Moderate authorized.

Slack also has features like Enterprise Key Management that allow admins fine-grained control over data encryption, as well as Native Data Loss Prevention to help manage the protection of sensitive information and confidential resources. Learn more about Slack’s commitment to security.
